title: Provides for the declaration of housing emergencies for rental housing accommodations located in buildings owned by certain limited-profit housing companies
summary: Provides for the declaration of housing emergencies for rental housing accommodations located in buildings owned by certain limited-profit housing companies.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to the declaration of housing emergencies for rental housing accommodations located in buildings owned by certain limited-profit housing companies
